DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use Epidrum device identify epidural space labour parturients reduces morbidity , compare standard loss resistance technique .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Study Of Two Different Techniques For Identifying The Epidural Space In Parturients In Labour
DOC.criteria: Parturients receive epidural analgesia labour parturients withold consent parturients less 18 year old
